config.lostradar.general.searchRadius.to: The radius of the search area for the radar. This is measured in multiples of 8 chunks
config.lostradar.general.radarMaxRF.tool: Maximum RF storage that the radar item can hold
RF per tick that the the radar item can receive
config.lostradar.general.radarMinRFForMa: Minimum RF that the radar item must have to be able to show the map fully
config.lostradar.general.hilightR1.toolt: The red component of the hilight color one
config.lostradar.general.hilightG1.toolt: The green component of the hilight color one
config.lostradar.general.hilightB1.toolt: The blue component of the hilight color one
config.lostradar.general.hilightR2.toolt: The red component of the hilight color two
config.lostradar.general.hilightG2.toolt: The green component of the hilight color two
config.lostradar.general.hilightB2.toolt: The blue component of the hilight color two
